INSERT INTO student_info ( id, username, name, sex, college, major, grade, clazz, phone, email )VALUES
( #{studentInfo.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.clazz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentInfo.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select si.id, username, name, sex, college, major, grade, clazz, phone, email from student_info si inner join attend_clazz ac on si.id = ac.id where ac.team_id = #{teamId}
